__e: And just so you know, I am not that afraid of death.
I just want you to know, I'm here for you if you need anything, anything at all.
Whatever you tell them about me, whatever you say. I just need you to know, I had to do, okay?
I want you to know that I feel terrible... about what happened to that boy.
But I want you to know I never hurt any good people.
I know what you did in the war, and before you die, I want you to know that I know.
I just wanted you to know that I have the utmost respect for you and your family.
That's great to know. Yeah, and I want you to know that I had probably the best night of my life last night.
You've always been here for us, and we want you to know that we'll always be there for you...
I want you to know when George doesn't want you it's for one reason only - because he sees you for what you are.
I want-- I want you to know that everything I did I was led to believe was for the good of the country.
So you would know what it feels like... to have everything that you care about in the world... ripped away from you-
You can't tell me what to do, because I don't think you know what you're doing.
The long and short of it is, I think that probably you're entitled to know what you can expect from me just as I'm entitled to know what I can expect from you.
Then how come you don't know where it is?
But no reason why you should know, a chap like you.
Well, I'm afraid that's not the only thing you don't know.
I just want you to know how sorry I am.
But it's very important to me that you know how much I love your daughter.
I wanted you to know how much I appreciate everything that you've done for me.
I just wanted to let you know that he is like that with everybody.
I know what your father did to you, And I want you to know That he can never, ever hurt you again.
I just want you to know there's a way out, if you want one.
